#summary List of other software products that can be used with or instead of Google Refine 

----
*NOTE:* The project & documentation is in the process of moving to [https://github.com/OpenRefine/OpenRefine/wiki/Related-Software]. Please check [https://github.com/OpenRefine/OpenRefine/wiki/Related-Software there] first for the latest information. 
----

(in no particular order)

  * [http://www.powerpivot.com/ Microsoft PowerPivot]
  * [http://rapid-i.com/content/view/181/190/lang,en/ Rapid Miner]
  * [http://orange.biolab.si/ Orange]
  * [http://www.talend.com/ Talend]
  * [http://rattle.togaware.com/ Rattle]
  * [http://www.tableausoftware.com/ Tableau]
  * [http://spotfire.tibco.com/ Spotfire]
  * [http://www.pentaho.com Pentaho] 
  * [http://www.cloveretl.com CloverETL]
  * [http://www.informatica.com/PRODUCTS_SERVICES/POWERCENTER/OPTIONS/METADATA/Pages/metadata_exchange_features.aspx Informatica Powercenter]
  * [http://www.elixirtech.com/products/DataETL.html Elixir Repertoire]
  * [http://www.pervasivedatarush.com/Pages/default.aspx Pervasive Datarush]
  * [http://www.palantirtech.com/ Palantir]
  * [http://www.datamystic.com/textpipe.html TextPipe]
  * [http://www.bonitasoft.com/products/bonita-open-solution-open-source-bpm Bonita Business Process Manager]
From the academia
  * [http://control.cs.berkeley.edu/abc/ Potter's Wheel] ([http://control.cs.berkeley.edu/abc/abc-rel/1.3/snapshots/ screenshots]) by Vijayshankar Raman and Joseph M. Hellerstein (UCBerkeley)
  * [http://web.tagus.ist.utl.pt/~helena.galhardas/ajax.html AJAX] by H.Galhardas, D. Florescu, D. Shasha, E. Simon, J.P. Matsumoto, C.A. Saita
  * [http://queens.db.toronto.edu/project/clio/ Clio] - UToronto, IBM
  * [http://vis.stanford.edu/wrangler/ Data Wrangler]
  * [http://www.stat.ucla.edu/~jeroen/ggplot2.html Yeroon.net/ggplot2] - a javascript web interface for R package, ggplot2 - Jeroen C.L. Ooms, Hadley Wickham

Feel free to add suggestions in the comments.
